config:
Did you know Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to earn CLE credit for attending select Justia Webinars? This year alone, we have offered five California-accredited CLE presentations, with even more courses on the horizon in the coming months!

Non-California Pros may be eligible to obtain credit for these presentations through their jurisdiction's self-submission process, and we are continuously looking at new states for CLE expansion.

ad2.subtitle:
Ready to Start Taking Advantage
of Justia CLE?

config:
Coming Summer 2023: Justia Connect Pros will be eligible to earn CLE credit through select on-demand presentations.
Be on the lookout for more details!
